member.name: M:MathFun.Api.Controllers.MathExpressionsController.EvaluateExpression(MathFun.Api.Models.ExpressionRequest)
member.summary: Fulfills student requests to evaluate a custom expression
member.param: The request that contains the expression and variables
member.returns: The evaluated expression and the computed value.

member.name: T:MathFun.Api.Models.ExpressionRequest
member.summary: Represents a user's REST math equation evaluation request.

member.name: P:MathFun.Api.Models.ExpressionRequest.Expression
member.summary: Gets or sets the client's math expression.

member.name: P:MathFun.Api.Models.ExpressionRequest.VariableEntries
member.summary: Gets or sets the entries that contains the values for each variable.

member.name: T:MathFun.Api.Models.ExpressionResponse
member.summary: Represents a REST response to an expression request.

member.name: P:MathFun.Api.Models.ExpressionResponse.AdjustedExpression
member.summary: Gets or sets the parsed and normalized mathematic expression.

member.name: P:MathFun.Api.Models.ExpressionResponse.ValueGenerated
member.summary: Gets or sets the value generated by the MathExpression.

member.name: T:MathFun.Api.Models.VariableEntry
